name: First Line
tag_list: oxford, computer, computer-support, network, maintenance, telecoms, services
overview:
First Line provides IT support and consultancy to businesses in and around Oxfordshire.

They provide a range of services helping to support and maintain businesses with a high reliance on IT. As IT becomes more and more integral to the functioning of successful companies so First Line’s services become increasingly important.

The range of services offered include:

  • Helpdesk support
  • Network support
  • Network maintenance
  • Emergency support
  • IT health check
  • Managed backup
  • IT first aid
  • Onsite visits
  • Your part time IT engineer
  • Desktop and laptop repairs
